isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: MIDLAND MODELS EL-1300 AND EL-1600 - ASSEMBLE - CRANKSHAFT BEARING CAPS

step1.para: Place a new gasket on the crankcase front cap mating surface.
Apply a small amount of engine oil to the crankshaft seal. Slide the front bearing cap over the crankshaft end. Do not damage the seal.

Place new gasket on rear cap mating surface. Install the spring or bowed washer in the end cap. The outer diameter of bowed washer must contact the bottom of the hole in the end cap. Lubricate the seal with oil.
Install end cap making sure seal and spring or bowed washer do not fall out.
Pull bearing cap into position by alternately tightening the four attaching bolts. Torque bolts to 120 - 160 in-lbs. (13.5 - 18.0 N•m).
Crankshaft should revolve freely after cap installation.
